name: WIBE
description: Catch up with those that matter most
overview:
An app that allows you create and manage Wibes, keeping you connected to those that matter most.

Features:

  • Live map to keep an eye on the ‘be there in 5 minutes’ types*

  • Uses your phone contacts (Do you really want to catchup with all 700 of your Facebook friends for lunch?!)

  • Post notifications/comments on Wibe

  • Private Wibes, Open Wibes, Recurring Wibes etc

  • NO ADS! NO BANNERS!

Definition:

Wibe [wahyb]

noun

  1. Informal gathering often between close friends or family members

  2. A speedily organized happening often of minor importance
